author: Kay
content:
Restaurant behind the most dodgy looking alleyway ðŸ˜† but restaurant interior is decent and simple but not fancy - what you would expect from a quick eat place

A handful of curry options based on the meat or veg. Changes each day, and to be honest, half the time, I have no clue what curry they are, but they're all so nice. Some are slightly spicier than others, so if you can't eat spicy food, then make sure to ask.
Portion sizes are large for the price, and the curries are delicious.

Mango lassi is also available by the glass - just ask for it when you pay at the counter.
